message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the value of this product, I could meet you halfway at $160. This offer stands as a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
